block_info.label: Bitonic Sort
block_info.description: Bitonic Sort block targeted for AI Engines.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: Data type of individual I/O data samples.
parameters.label: Input/Output data type:

parameters.name: num_frames
parameters.description: The number of lists to sort per call to the kernel
parameters.label: Number of frames:

parameters.name: casc_length
parameters.description: The number of kernels to be used to split up and cascade the function.
parameters.label: Number of cascade stages:

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: sort input samples list in descending or ascending order.
parameters.label: Sort order:

parameters.name: ssr
parameters.description: TP_SSR specifies the number of parallel input/output paths where samples are interleaved between paths, giving an overall higher throughput.
parameters.label: SSR:
